title: One The Unity Song All actress actor flim stars in One The Unity Song
stanzas:
Titled One - The Unity Song

George Peter and Friends 

With

Flim Stars

 Vikram, Sudeep, Mammootty, Mohanlal, Suresh Gopi, 
Vivek Oberoi, Zayed Khan, Asin, Karthika, Lakshmi Rai, 
Mamta and Bhavana; 

Sport Stars

Saina Nehwal and Sreesanth

Singers/instrumentalists 

Blaaze, Shwetha Mohan, Shankar Mahadevan, 
Vasundhara Das, KS Chitra, Usha Uthup, 
Ustad Ghulam Mustafa Khan and sons, 
K J Yesudas, 
Vikku Vinayakaram 
and Stephen Devassy ... .
